description: This Code System includes the SPOR list for Ingredient Role

concept.definition: Ingredient that is inert in relation to the intended activity of the medicinal product [CEN 12610:3.13].
A substance sometimes included in a vaccine formulation to enhance or modify the immune-stimulating properties of a vaccine [NAID].
Ingredient that alone or in combination with one or more other ingredients is considered to fulfil the intended activity of a medicinal product [CEN 12610:3.1].

concept.display: Raw materials used in the manufacture of the product

name: SPOR 100000072050 for Ingredient Role
title: SPOR 100000072050 for Ingredient Role
